name: Some Sort of Platformer
description:
Looks like a weird 2D Platform Shooter, who knows?

Takes about 10-15 minutes.

All Pixel Arts are from all over the internet.

Font

  • SUPERSCR
  • Mizore
  • FiraCode

Music

  • Mortal Coil - Defrini
  • Feed The Machine - Dream-Protocol
  • Game Master - Dream-Protocol
  • Retro Platforming - David Fesliyan
  • Funny Bit - David Renda
